confirmDelegatingToInactive.description: Status of this validator is {{validatorStatus}}. Your delegation might not generate any rewards.
confirmDelegatingToInactive.title: Are you sure you want to continue?

confirmDelegatingToTop.description: This validator is ranked in the top 20 by stake. Please consider delegating to a smaller validator to increase network security and decentralization.

confirmSendingToValidator.description: This is a validator address. Transfers to this address do not stake your funds with the validator.
confirmSendingToValidator.title: Are you sure you want to continue?

sendTransaction.success: Transaction successfully sent. The transaction might take up to a minute to appear on your account.

summary.noWalletIsOpen: To send, receive, stake and swap {{ticker}} tokens, <HomeLink>open your wallet</HomeLink>.

consensusWithdraw.sent: Received <Amount/> from withdrawal out of {{runtimeName}} ParaTime

banner.buildPreview: Please note this is an experimental build of Oasis Wallet and your secrets are not safe. ONLY USE IT FOR TESTING.
banner.buildStaging: Please note this is the staging deployment of Oasis Wallet. ONLY USE IT FOR TESTING.
banner.domainMoved: Oasis Wallet has a new home at <NewLink />.

createWallet.doNotShare: Never share your keyphrase, anyone with your keyphrase can access your wallet and your tokens.
createWallet.instruction: Save your keyphrase in the right order in a secure location, you will need it to open your wallet.

errors.LedgerDerivedDifferentAccount: This account does not belong to the currently connected Ledger.
errors.LedgerOasisAppIsNotOpen: Oasis App on Ledger is closed.
errors.indexerAPIError: {{indexerName}} appears to be down, some information may be missing or out of date. Please, come back later.
errors.ledgerAppVersionNotSupported: Oasis App on Ledger is closed or outdated. Make sure Ledger is unlocked, the Oasis App is opened and up to date.
errors.ledgerCannotOpenOasisApp: Could not open Oasis App on Ledger. Make sure Ledger is unlocked and the Oasis App is opened.
errors.ledgerNoDeviceSelected: No Ledger device selected. Make sure it is connected, <LedgerHelp>check common USB connection issues with Ledger</LedgerHelp>, and <ChromeHelp>check site permissions don't block USB devices</ChromeHelp>.
errors.usbTransportNotSupported: Your browser does not support WebUSB (e.g. Firefox). Try using Chrome.

fatalError.heading: A fatal error occurred
fatalError.instruction: A fatal error has occurred and Oasis Wallet must stop. Try refreshing the page and reopening your wallet to see if the issue persists. If the issue persists, please contact our support team via <Email/> email and attach the report below.

fiatOnramp.astarFootnote: It is hereby noted that AStar Technologies, a Cayman Islands exempted company is acting on behalf and for the purposes of Oasis, and is also the provider of the Oasis Wallet.
fiatOnramp.description: This feature allows you to convert your fiat currency into cryptocurrency.
fiatOnramp.notMainnet: You can only use this feature when your are on the mainnet.
fiatOnramp.notYourAccount: You can only use this feature when your wallet is open.
fiatOnramp.thirdPartyAcknowledge: I understand that I’m using a third-party solution and Oasis* does not carry any responsibility over the usage of this solution.
fiatOnramp.thirdPartyDisclaimer: This service is provided by an external party. Oasis* does not carry any responsibility. All fees charged by Transak.

footer.github: Oasis Wallet is fully <GithubLink>open source</GithubLink> - Feedback and issues are appreciated!

poweredBy.oasismonitor: Powered by Oasis Monitor API & Oasis gRPC
poweredBy.oasisscan: Powered by Oasis Scan API & Oasis gRPC

create.description: Create a brand new wallet to send, receive, stake and swap ROSE tokens.

existing.description: Open your existing wallet stored on Ledger, import a private key or a mnemonic phrase.

extension.instructionStep: Once device is connected continue the operation in the wallet app

instructionSteps.closeLedgerLive: Close Ledger Live app on the computer
instructionSteps.connectLedger: Connect your Ledger device to the computer
instructionSteps.openOasisApp: Open the Oasis App on your Ledger device

bitpie.warning: ❗ BitPie wallet users: You cannot import the mnemonic phrase directly from your BitPie wallet. <DocsLink>Check documentation for details.</DocsLink>

openWallet.header: How do you want to open your wallet?

mnemonic.error: Invalid keyphrase. Please make sure to input the words in the right order, all lowercase.
mnemonic.instruction: Enter all your keyphrase words below separated by spaces. Most keyphrases are made of either 24 or 12 words.

privateKey.instruction: Enter your private key in Base64 format.

amount.depositDescription: Please enter the amount of {{ticker}} to deposit and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}"
amount.emptyAccount: The account is empty. There is nothing to withdraw.
amount.tooltip: Max value may be decreased by the fee
amount.withdrawDescription: Please enter the amount of {{ticker}} to withdraw and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}"

confirmation.confirmDepositDescription: Please confirm the deposit amount and the recipient address are correct and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}".
confirmation.confirmDepositToForeignAccountDescriptio: Destination address does not match any of the accounts in your wallet! Some services such as exchanges, may not support direct deposits to fund your account. For better compatibility, we strongly recommend that you first deposit to your ParaTime account and then transfer {{ticker}} to the destination address.
confirmation.confirmTransferLabel: I confirm the amount and the address are correct
confirmation.confirmTransferToForeignAccount: I confirm I want to directly withdraw to an external account
confirmation.confirmTransferToValidatorDescription: This is a validator wallet address. Transfers to this address do not stake your funds to the validator.
confirmation.confirmTransferToValidatorLabel: I confirm I want to transfer {{ticker}} to a validator address
confirmation.confirmWithdrawDescription: Please confirm the withdrawal amount and the recipient address are correct and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}".
confirmation.confirmWithdrawToForeignAccountDescripti: Destination address does not match any of the accounts in your wallet! Some services such as exchanges, may not support direct withdrawals to fund the account. For better compatibility, we strongly recommend that you first withdraw to your consensus account and then transfer {{ticker}} to the destination address.
confirmation.depositDescription: You are about to deposit {{value}} {{ticker}} to {{address}} on {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}}
confirmation.withdrawDescription: You are about to withdraw {{value}} {{ticker}} from {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} to {{address}}

error.depositDescription: Transaction failed. We were not able to complete deposit of {{value}} {{ticker}} to {{address}} on {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}}
error.withdrawDescription: Transaction failed. We were not able to complete withdrawal of {{value}} {{ticker}} from {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} to {{address}}

footer.notice: * EVMc - compatible with Ethereum Virtual Machine

recipient.depositDescription: Please enter the recipient address on {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}"
recipient.evmcWithdrawDescription: Please enter the private key of the account on ParaTime, the recipient address on consensus and click "{{nextButtonLabel}}"
recipient.withdrawDescription: Please enter the recipient address on consensus and click "{{nextButtonLabel}}"

selection.depositDescription: Please select which ParaTime you wish to deposit your {{ticker}} to and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}".
selection.withdrawDescription: Please select which ParaTime you wish to withdraw your {{ticker}} from and then click "{{nextButtonLabel}}".

summary.depositDescription: You have successfully deposited {{value}} {{ticker}} to {{address}} on {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}}
summary.withdrawDescription: You have successfully withdrawn {{value}} {{ticker}} from {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} to {{address}}

transfers.depositDisabled: You don't have any {{ticker}} tokens to transfer
transfers.description: Click on the "{{depositButtonLabel}}" button to deposit your {{ticker}} from consensus to a ParaTime of your choice or "{{withdrawButtonLabel}}" to withdraw your {{ticker}} from a ParaTime back to consensus.

validation.insufficientBalanceToPayFee: Insufficient balance to pay the fee
validation.invalidDecimalValue: Maximum of {{decimals}} decimal places is allowed
validation.invalidEthPrivateKeyLength: Private key should be 64 characters long
validation.invalidFee: Value must be integer greater than or equal to 0

createProfile.startPersisting: Store private keys locally, protected by a password
createProfile.unsupported: Persistence is not supported in this browser.

deleteProfile.description:
Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This action cannot be undone and will erase your private keys.

To continue please enter '{{confirmationKeyword}}' below.
deleteProfile.title: Delete Profile

loginToProfile.description: Log into your existing user profile on this computer to access the wallets you already added.
loginToProfile.title: Welcome Back!

preview.warning: Once you confirm this transaction you will not be able to cancel it. Carefully review it, and confirm once you are sure that you want to send it.

types.addEscrow: Delegating your tokens to a validator and generate rewards
types.reclaimEscrow: Reclaiming your tokens delegated to a validator
types.transfer: Transferring tokens from your account to another
